thread.section_title: Grange Wellington Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice
thread.title_full: Nice - Review of Grange Wellington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: intrepidexplorersid
title: Nice
text: My partner booked this hotel to celebrate my 50th birthday and asked for a special room. We were allocated an executive double which wasn't special at all so we asked for something different and we're given apartment 4 which was lovely. It had a small kitchen so making a snack was easy. Ordered lots of champagne which we collected from the bar as there is a fiver tray charge. Breakfast was nice, staff lovely and the location is perfect.
